dct_title_s: De gelegentheyt van 't paradys en 't landt Canaan
dct_description_sm: by R. & J. Wetstein en William Smith en te Leiden by Samuel Luchtmans ; Albert Schut schulp.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Duytsche mylen", "Fransche mylen", and "Italiaensche mylen".
Illustrations of a compass rose, ship, and sea creature.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text, e.g.: Dese kaerte wert gestelt voor het 3. cap. Genesis.
